description: This package installs 2.6.x version of MongoDB into c:\mongodb\*version* directory. Doesn't register any services by default. Rewritten from scratch, added uninstall, backup functionality.
summary: MongoDB (from "humongous") is a scalable, high-performance, open source NoSQL database written in C++. This package installs MongoDB into c:\mongodb\*version* directory. Doesn't register mongod service by default.
author: 10gen
